articles.title: Gambhir's fresh attack on Virat Kohli, calls him 'casual' for 'nothing shot' off Shaheen in IND vs PAK Asia Cup match - Hindustan Times

articles.content: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli were bowled in the same ODI for the first time, courtesy of Pakistan fast bowler Shaheen Shah Afridi. But the similarities between their dismissals end there. Rohit recei… [+2391 chars]
